text: Sherrelwood is a census-designated place (CDP) in Adams County, Colorado, United States. The population was 19,228 at the 2020 census. == Geography == Sherrelwood is found at (39.840722, -105.001540). According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of , of which is land and , or 0.4%, is water. == References == Category:Census-designated places in Colorado
title: Sherrelwood, Colorado
